headerTitle: MORE THAN A DESTINATION, IS A ESCAPE
findDescription: Explore the best places around you with just one click. Find outdoor activities, restaurants, and unique places to visit without going too far. Discover new experiences just around the corner and start enjoying today!
categoriesTitle: WHERE DO YOU WANT TO ESCAPE?
categoriesDescription: Explore unique destinations and live unforgettable experiences. Find the perfect place for your next adventure. Choose your next destination and start dreaming!
escDescription: We design the route of your trip in minutes
footerEslogan: Travel, discover, and live to the fullest. We transform your dreams into unforgettable adventures. The world is waiting for you!
ShareLocationInfo: We need your location to recommend places nearby that you might enjoy.
DragAndDrop: Drag and drop or click here to upload your files
typePlaceName: Type the name of the place
aboutDescription: We are a platform dedicated to connecting travelers and locals with unique experiences and places, tailored to their tastes and preferences. Our goal is to help our users discover activities they truly enjoy while exploring new destinations.
misionDes: Ser la plataforma l√≠der en recomendaciones personalizadas, conectando a miles de usuarios con experiencias que se ajusten a sus intereses y preferencias en cualquier lugar del mundo.
visionDes: To be the leading platform for personalized recommendations, connecting thousands of users with experiences that fit their interests and preferences anywhere in the world.
HIWdescription: Our platform uses a personalized recommendation system, where users can select their preferences. From these selections we show local places and events that fit those interests, offering a personalized experience on each visit.
contactDes: Do you have any questions, suggestions, or need help? We're here to help! Fill out the form or use the contact details below.
contactInfoDes: You can contact us through the following means:
termDes: By using our platform, you agree to the following terms and conditions. Please read them carefully.
term1Des: Our platform allows users to discover and enjoy personalized recommendations of places and activities. You agree to use this service responsibly and to respect the rights of other users and establishments promoted on our platform.
term2Des: To access certain features, you may need to create an account with us. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and all activity that occurs under your account. We reserve the right to suspend or delete accounts that violate these terms.
term3Des: We are committed to protecting your privacy and personal data. Please see our Privacy Policy to learn how we collect, use, and protect your information
term4Des: All content on the platform, including text, images, logos, and software, is owned by us or our partners and is protected by intellectual property laws. You may not reproduce, distribute, or modify any content without our express permission.
term5Des: We are not responsible for any damage or loss arising from the use of our platform, nor do we guarantee that all services or recommendations will meet your expectations. Our platform is provided 'as is' without warranties of any kind.
term6Des: We reserve the right to update or modify these terms at any time. We will notify you of important changes and encourage you to check this page regularly to stay informed.
